name: Rune It Out
description:
In this world where magic exists a great mage has invented a new way of casting magic. It was by combining runes together that he was able to cast spells so he named it "Rune Casting". Not long after, a new competition was invented, one in which multiple so-called "Rune Mages" fought to attain an Artefact which was called the "Artefact Battle".

Rune Chanting :
Combine multiple different runes to create multiple unique spells

Multiplayer PvP :
Fight against other players in an ultimate Rune Magic battle!

Miscasting :
Concentrate on casting your spells. If you don't, you will miscast them!

Chanting :
Type your spells as fast as you can. Otherwise, your RuneMage also won't chant them fast

Mana:
Counter, the spells of your enemies or hit them with your own to acquire mana and cast the Ultimate spell!
